channel.title: SplitChat
channel.description: Anyway to make it so when you log out and then in its still split chat. Like when you log it saves your settings for splitchat and all that stuff. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 03:15:06 pm[/size][hr]bump. I want my settings to save so if i have split screen on and i log out i want it to save.
